tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_impl_ex_cont_fax AS SELECT ac.activity_id AS amp_activity_id, cp.value AS fax FROM amp_activity_contact ac, amp_contact_properties cp WHERE ((((ac.contact_id = cp.contact_id) AND ((ac.contact_type)::text = 'IMPL_EXEC_AGENCY_CONT'::text)) AND ((cp.name)::text = 'contact fax'::text)) AND (btrim((cp.value)::text) != ''::text));;;
